transcript:
friendship for you; but now I en- treat you for God's sake to do this for my son and I shall always regard you as a benefac- tor," she added hurriedly. "No, don't be angry, but promise! I have asked Golitsyn and he has refused. Be the kindhearted man you always were," she said, trying to smile though tears were in her eyes. 
"Papa, we shall be late," said Princess Hel ne, turning her beautiful head and look- ing over her classically molded shoulder as she stood waiting by the door.
